select
order_code orderCode,order_type orderType,store_name customerName,store_code customerCode,create_time createDate, order_status orderStatus,payment_status paymentStatus,transport_center_name transportCenterName,transport_center_code transportCenterCode, warehouse_name warehouseName,warehouse_code warehouseCode,supplier_name supplierName,supplier_code supplierCode,logistics_remission_type distributionMode,logistics_remission_ratio logisticsRemissionRatio, consignee, consignee_phone consigneePhone,province_code provinceCode,province_name provinceName, city_code cityCode, city_name cityName,district_code districtCode,district_name districtName,receiving_address detailAddress, zip_code zipCode,payment_type paymentType, payment_type_code paymentTypeCode,total_orders productTotalAmount, activity_amount+preferential_quota discountAmount ,actual_amount_paid orderAmount,product_num productNum, payment_time paymentTime, invoice_type invoiceType,invoice_title invoiceTitle,create_by operator,place_order_code operatorCode,place_order_time operatorTime, activity_amount activityDiscount,weight,original fatherOrderCode, order_original orderOriginal,remake,company_code companyCode, company_name companyName from order_list where order_code=#{code} or original=#{code}

update order_list
order_code = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=BIT},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payment_status = #{paymentStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_code = #{storeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_name = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_type = #{storeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_orders = #{totalOrders,jdbcType=INTEGER},
actual_amount_paid = #{actualAmountPaid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activity_amount = #{activityAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
preferential_quota = #{preferentialQuota,jdbcType=INTEGER},
logistics_remission_ratio = #{logisticsRemissionRatio,jdbcType=INTEGER},
place_order_time = #{placeOrderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
account_balance = #{accountBalance,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
